item.title: LinkedIn Interview
item.description: I interviewed today with LinkedIn and [REDACTED]. He was intimidatingly knowledgeable and described a work environment that I really hope to join. I hope that I have the skill set necessary. What follows are notes of the responses for my edification, not necessarily how I answered. Describe what happens when we type ssh shell.linkedin.com and hit enter. When you hit enter, your shell gets the string you entered on the command line.
